sentences.en: An atmosphere of anticipation vibrated through the crowd.
sentences.cn: 期待的心情在人群中弥漫开来。

sentences.en: By Saturday night the town was alive with speculation and anticipation.
sentences.cn: 到星期六夜间,全城充满了推测和预料.

sentences.en: He bought extra food in anticipation of more people coming than he'd invited.
sentences.cn: 他预料来的客人会比邀请的多，就多买了食物。

sentences.en: He's been drinking a little in anticipation of the Queen's birthday.
sentences.cn: 他这阵子爱喝上两口,说是为了预祝女王生日.

sentences.en: Her eyes flickered nervously in anticipation.
sentences.cn: 她紧张而期待地眨着眼睛.

sentences.en: I have take my coat and umbrella in anticipation of rain.
sentences.cn: 我估计有雨，所以带著外套和伞。

sentences.en: Investors were storing up a lot of cash in anticipation of disaster.
sentences.cn: 投资者预料会出现灾难，正在储备大量现金。

sentences.en: Meg was in a state of fevered anticipation.
sentences.cn: 梅格处于一种兴奋的期待中。

sentences.en: People bought in stocks of tinned goods in anticipation of a famine year.
sentences.cn: 人们买进大量罐头食品以防饥荒的一年.

sentences.en: She waited in eager anticipation for Robert to arrive.
sentences.cn: 她急切地期盼着罗伯特到来。

sentences.en: Taylor was excited and full of anticipation at the prospect of the trip.
sentences.cn: 泰勒很兴奋，对这次旅行满怀期待。

sentences.en: The smile died , squeezed out by spasms of anticipation and anxiety.
sentences.cn: 一阵阵预测和焦虑把她脸上的微笑挤掉了.

sentences.en: We are looking forward to their visit with eager anticipation.
sentences.cn: 我们热切地期待着他们的来访.

sentences.en: We await the next volume of this superb edition with keen anticipation.
sentences.cn: 我们殷切期盼着这本精装版下一卷的面世。

sentences.en: We waited at the station in anticipation of her arrival.
sentences.cn: 我们在车站等着,期待她的到来.
我们怀着紧张的心情期待着.

words.tran_cn: 预期的；提早发生的；期待着的
预期，期望；占先，抢先；提前使用
希望；预感；先发制人；预支

trans.tran_en: when you are expecting something to happen
